mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatting_room (product_id, buyer_id, seller_id, chatting_status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{productId}, #{buyerId}, #{sellerId}, #{chattingStatus}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT p.title as product_name, p.id as product_id, cr.id as chatting_room_id, cr.seller_id, m.nickname as seller_nickname, cr.created_at as last_chatting_time FROM chatting_room cr JOIN product p ON cr.product_id = p.id JOIN member m ON cr.seller_id = m.id WHERE cr.buyer_id = #{authId} OR cr.seller_id = #{authId} ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC
